mapper.select: SELECT (comment_id, member_id, post_id, text, REG_DATE) FROM COMMENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (comment_id, member_id, post_id, text, REG_DATE) VALUES(${commentId},${memberId},${postId},#{text},#{deleteYN},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET delete_yn = 'Y' WHERE comment_id = ${comment_id}
